name: Rasta Noide V2
description:
The game consists of surviving the enemy attacks.

The longer you survive, the stronger the enemies.

Control:

A - Shoot
SPACE - Special
ARROWS - Move Player

Credits:

Effect sounds & Music: Juhani Junkala (contact: juhani.junkala@musician.org)

Sprite: Kenney (https://kenney.nl) 

Programmed and idealized by: Me, Andrerjoc
